  eval: true

  freeze: true
---


::: callout-note
This is a note callout. I will use this for personal comments as well.
:::

###   ---  


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(spdep, sp, tmap, sf, ClustGeo, cluster, factoextra, NbClust, tidyverse, GGally)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
shan_sf <- read_rds("data/rds/shan_sf.rds")
shan_ict <- read_rds("data/rds/shan_ict.rds")
shan_sf_cluster <- read_rds("data/rds/shan_sf_cluster.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
proxmat <- dist(shan_ict, method = 'euclidean')
hclust_ward <- hclust(proxmat, method = 'ward.D')
groups <- as.factor(cutree(hclust_ward, k=6))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
shan_sf_cluster <- cbind(shan_sf, as.matrix(groups)) %>%
  rename(`CLUSTER` = `as.matrix.groups.`) %>%
  select(-c(3:4, 7:9)) %>%
  rename(TS = TS.x)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(hclust_ward, cex = 0.6)
rect.hclust(hclust_ward, k = 6, border = 2:5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
qtm(shan_sf_cluster, "CLUSTER")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
dist <- st_distance(shan_sf, shan_sf)
distmat <- as.dist(dist)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
shan.nb <- poly2nb(shan_sf)
summary(shan.nb)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Neighbour list object:
Number of regions: 55 
Number of nonzero links: 264 
Percentage nonzero weights: 8.727273 
Average number of links: 4.8 
Link number distribution:

 2  3  4  5  6  7  8  9 
 5  9  7 21  4  3  5  1 
5 least connected regions:
3 5 7 9 47 with 2 links
1 most connected region:
8 with 9 links
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(st_geometry(shan_sf),
     border = grey(.5))
pts <- st_coordinates(st_centroid(shan_sf))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: st_centroid assumes attributes are constant over geometries
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(shan.nb,
     pts,
     col="blue",
     add=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lcosts <- nbcosts(shan.nb, shan_ict)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
shan.w <- nb2listw(shan.nb, lcosts, style = "B")
summary(shan.w)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Characteristics of weights list object:
Neighbour list object:
Number of regions: 55 
Number of nonzero links: 264 
Percentage nonzero weights: 8.727273 
Average number of links: 4.8 
Link number distribution:

 2  3  4  5  6  7  8  9 
 5  9  7 21  4  3  5  1 
5 least connected regions:
3 5 7 9 47 with 2 links
1 most connected region:
8 with 9 links

Weights style: B 
Weights constants summary:
   n   nn       S0       S1        S2
B 55 3025 76267.65 58260785 522016004
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
shan.mst <- mstree(shan.w)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(st_geometry(shan_sf),
     border=grey(.5))
plot.mst(shan.mst,
     pts,
     col="blue",
     cex.lab=0.7,
     cex.circles=0.005,
     add=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-13-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
skater.clust6 <- skater(edges = shan.mst[,1:2],
                        data = shan_ict, 
                        method = "euclidean",
                        ncuts = 5)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(st_geometry(shan_sf),
     border=gray(.5))
plot(skater.clust6,
     pts,
     cex.lab=.7,
     groups.colors=c("red","green","blue","brown","pink"),
     cex.circles=0.005,
     add=TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in segments(coords[id1, 1], coords[id1, 2], coords[id2, 1], coords[id2,
: "add" is not a graphical parameter
Warning in segments(coords[id1, 1], coords[id1, 2], coords[id2, 1], coords[id2,
: "add" is not a graphical parameter
Warning in segments(coords[id1, 1], coords[id1, 2], coords[id2, 1], coords[id2,
: "add" is not a graphical parameter
Warning in segments(coords[id1, 1], coords[id1, 2], coords[id2, 1], coords[id2,
: "add" is not a graphical parameter
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
groups_mat <- as.matrix((skater.clust6$groups))
shan_sf_spatialcluster <- cbind(shan_sf_cluster, as.factor(groups_mat)) %>%
  rename(`skater_CLUSTER` = `as.factor.groups_mat.`)
qtm(shan_sf_spatialcluster, "skater_CLUSTER")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cr <- choicealpha(proxmat, distmat, range.alpha = seq(0, 1, 0.1),
                  K=6, graph = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-2.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
clustG <- hclustgeo(proxmat, distmat, alpha = 0.2)
groups <- as.factor(cutree(clustG, k=6))
shan_sf_clustGeo <- cbind(shan_sf, as.matrix(groups)) %>%
  rename(`clustGeo` = `as.matrix.groups.`)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
qtm(shan_sf_clustGeo, "clustGeo")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-19-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggparcoord(data = shan_sf_clustGeo,
          columns = c(17:21),
          scale = "globalminmax",
          alphaLines = 0.2,
          boxplot = TRUE,
          title = "Multiple Parallel Coordinates Plots of ICT Variables by Cluster") +
  facet_grid(~ clustGeo) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30))
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
